com.nutiteq.renderprojections
Class RenderProjection

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.renderprojections.RenderProjection

public abstract class RenderProjection
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract base class for all render projections. Render projections define surface for maps and provide methods for transforming points between internal and render surface coordinate systems plus various other transformations.

Constructor Summary

Method Detail

project

public Point3D project(MapPos mapPos)
Project map point given in internal coordinates to render surface coordinate system.

Parameters:
mapPos - map point to project (in internal coordinates)
Returns:
projected point

unproject

public MapPos unproject(Point3D point)
Unproject render surface point to internal coordinates.

Parameters:
point - point to unproject
Returns:
unprojected point on the map in internal coordinates

Parameters:

Returns:

                                   Point3D point2)
Calculate distance between two points.

Parameters:
point1 - first point
point2 - second point
Returns:
distance between the points

getTranslateMatrix

public abstract double[] getTranslateMatrix(Point3D point1,
                                            Point3D point2,
                                            double t)
Calculate translation matrix from one point to another.

Parameters:
point1 - first point
point2 - second point
t - fractional distance between the points for the matrix. if 0, identity matrix is returned, if 1 then matrix that transforms point1 into point2 is returned.
Returns:
matrix encoded as 16-element array

getGlobalFrameMatrix

public abstract double[] getGlobalFrameMatrix(MapPos mapPos,
                                              boolean mapScale)
Calculate global frame matrix from internal coordinates.

Parameters:
mapPos - position on the map in internal coordinates
mapScale - if true, use underlying map scale. If false, use uniform scaling.
Returns:
matrix encoded as 16-element array

getLocalFrameMatrix

public abstract double[] getLocalFrameMatrix(Point3D point)
Calculate local frame matrix at given point.

Parameters:
point - point for the local frame
Returns:
matrix encoded as 16-element array.
